video.title: Queen of the South
video.synopsis: Forced to work for a cartel that recently killed her boyfriend, Teresa relies on her street smarts, a loyal pal and a mysterious notebook to survive.

episodes.synopsis: Teresa, a money changer in Mexico, falls for drug dealer GÃ¼ero, whose murder a year later forces her to flee from his enemies and lands her in Dallas.
episodes.title: Piloto

episodes.synopsis: To avoid prostitution, Teresa offers to be a drug mule and is put to the test. Meanwhile in Mexico, Brenda and her son try to evade Epifanio's thugs.
episodes.title: Cuarenta Minutos

episodes.synopsis: Teresa proves her loyalty to Camila and later impresses the trafficking boss with a special skill she picked up as a money changer in Mexico.
episodes.title: Estrategia De Entrada

episodes.synopsis: Teresa must think fast when things don't go as planned during her first solo delivery. Camila tries to win over her estranged husband's associates.
episodes.title: Lirio De Los Valles

episodes.synopsis: To set up the murder of a rival drug boss, Teresa infiltrates a wild party at an estate. Brenda spots a business opportunity right outside her motel.
episodes.title: Un alma, un mapa, a futuro

episodes.synopsis: After Epifanio tips off the DEA about Camila's incoming shipment from Colombia, she considers an idea involving Teresa that would cover the huge loss.
episodes.title: El EngaÃ±o Como la Regla

episodes.synopsis: Teresa visits the immigration lawyer. To pay back the Colombians, Camila sends James and Teresa to retrieve a stash of savings, but they're ambushed.
episodes.title: El Hombre PaÌjaro

episodes.synopsis: Brenda and her crew try making meth. As part of the plan to steal 25 kilos of cocaine from James's friends, Teresa goes undercover as a hotel maid.
episodes.title: Billete De Magia

episodes.synopsis: After learning the hotel maid will be killed, Teresa scrambles to help her escape to safety. A man from Florida comes to avenge his brothers' deaths.
episodes.title: Toma todo lo que puedas

episodes.synopsis: In Mexico, Teresa is met by MarÃ­a's irate relatives, who complicate her plans to retrieve GÃ¼ero's notebook. Camila reunites with her estranged spouse.
episodes.title: Esta cosa nuestra

episodes.synopsis: Brenda visits the Birdman's mansion and makes him an offer. Unbeknownst to either of them, James is taking aim at the kingpin with a sniper rifle.
episodes.title: Punto Sin Retorno

episodes.synopsis: The coordinates lead Teresa and Brenda to a shocking find. James leads a risky mission to extract a Jimenez cartel lieutenant from a DEA safe house.
episodes.title: Quinientos Mil

episodes.synopsis: When Epifanio learns his men have joined Camila's side, he retaliates in a way she's unprepared for. Hearing of this, Teresa makes Camila an offer.
episodes.title: Cicatriz

episodes.synopsis: To become Camila's partner, Teresa brokers an alliance with a gun-happy Texas smuggler. Epifanio also enters into a new partnership -- unwillingly.
episodes.title: El Cuerpo de Cristo

episodes.synopsis: To get the cash necessary to restart her business, Camila sets her sights on a high-stakes cartel horse race. Teresa encounters a ghost from her past.
episodes.title: Dios y el abogado

episodes.synopsis: A flashback reveals what happened to GÃ¼ero three months prior. Teresa and James embark on a risky mission to blow up Epifanio's drug-smuggling tunnel.
episodes.title: Un pacto con el diablo

episodes.synopsis: After learning the DEA has an informant, James sets a trap to find out who it is. A wedding in Sinaloa brings together Camila, Epifanio and JimÃ©nez.
episodes.title: El Beso de Judas

episodes.synopsis: Teresa and her companions go to Bolivia to find the notorious supplier El Santo, but their hunt is complicated by a soldier waging a personal vendetta.
episodes.title: El Nacimiento de Bolivia

episodes.synopsis: Held captive by a twisted cult led by El Santo, Teresa is forced to make a terrible choice that leads her to lose her mental grasp on reality.
episodes.title: El Camino de la Muerte

episodes.synopsis: Epifanio spots red flags near his daughter. Camila and Teresa find a mobster who can move a ton of coke, but they'll have to steal him from Epifanio.
episodes.title: El Precio de Fe

episodes.synopsis: Unable to take no for an answer, Camila sends Teresa and the crew to Chicago to give Devon Finch's tastemaker a mind-changing sample of their coke.
episodes.title: Sacar con sifÃ³n el mar

episodes.synopsis: Camila and Teresa meet with Devon Finch to negotiate a deal, unaware they're being followed. At a memorial in Sinaloa, Epifanio offers Boaz a proposal.
episodes.title: Solo el Amor de una Madre

episodes.synopsis: While searching through her husband's documents for evidence incriminating Camila, Kelly Ann finds something that she must show to Teresa right away.
episodes.title: Que manden a los payasos

episodes.synopsis: When Teresa and Kelly Ann go on the run, James's loyalties are put to the test. An oversight enables Agent Loya to track down the two fugitives.
episodes.title: La Noche Oscura del Alma

episodes.synopsis: To pay El Santo, Teresa recruits an army to steal the coke and cash from Camila's men. Camila's transfer to a maximum-security prison is interrupted.
episodes.title: Todas las horas hieren

episodes.synopsis: A video of Isabela reveals a clue as to her whereabouts. Teresa gets a nasty surprise when she goes to collect Devon Finch's payment for the cocaine.
episodes.title: La Ãºltima hora mata

episodes.synopsis: With Camila out for blood, Teresa retreats to Malta, where she considers an enticing deal with a European money launderer.
episodes.title: La Ermitana

episodes.synopsis: A familiar face reappears to help Teresa escape assassins and the police. Wondering who she can trust, she plans her next move.
episodes.title: El Colgado

episodes.synopsis: Even as she cements her deal with her European contact, Teresa risks everything when she discovers he traffics in more than just cryptocurrency.
episodes.title: Reina de Oros

episodes.synopsis: Teresa flees Malta to start fresh in Phoenix, Arizona. But her U.S. base has its own problems: hostile, local cartel bosses and a corrupt sheriff.
episodes.title: La Fuerza

episodes.synopsis: An old enemy seeking revenge and information attacks Teresaâs operation, and she must decide where her loyalties lie.
episodes.title: El Juicio

episodes.synopsis: In captivity, Teresa reunites with a close ally, and the two plan their escape. Camila, meanwhile, struggles to balance business, family and revenge.
episodes.title: Los Enamorados

episodes.synopsis: Teresa mourns a devastating loss, but business must go on as she faces a dangerous situation and forges a pivotal alliance.
episodes.title: Reina de Espadas

episodes.synopsis: When her plan to become the sole drug distributor in Phoenix turns bloody, Teresa readies for war and makes a deal with the devil.
episodes.title: El Carro

episodes.synopsis: Change rocks two empires as Teresa moves against her enemies in Phoenix and Camila faces a mutiny within her own organization.
episodes.title: El Diablo

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious summons leads Teresa to Bolivia for a reckoning with her supplier, El Santo.
episodes.title: La Muerte

episodes.synopsis: Teresa uncovers a mole in her operation and must make a heartbreaking choice that tests her loyalties.
episodes.title: Diez de Copas

episodes.synopsis: Bitter enemies come together for shared goals, and a failed rescue mission inspires a scheme to recover an ally and locate a foe.
episodes.title: Justicia

episodes.synopsis: Following a surprise attack, Teresa mounts a counterassault to secure her empire and eliminate her rivals once and for all.
episodes.title: El Mundo

episodes.synopsis: Starting fresh in New Orleans, Teresa quickly encounters rivals, shady politicians â and a new love interest. Back in Sinaloa, a thief makes trouble.
episodes.title: Bienvenidos a Nueva Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Raul and Teresa's fragile alliance is tested over a shipment. Tony goes missing, and disturbing clues turn up at his dorm.
episodes.title: Un Asunto De Familia

episodes.synopsis: A risky purchase makes problems for Teresa with Joel, Marcel and Judge Lafayette. Birdie proves a loyal ally. A happy reunion hits a snag.
episodes.title: Hospitalidad Surena

episodes.synopsis: Teresa's rendezvous with Eddie is cut short when Marcel makes a strike with deadly consequences. Boaz and Javier do some dirty work.
episodes.title: La Maldicion

episodes.synopsis: An unintended casualty has painful repercussions for Teresa as she lands a promising deal. A surprising new love affair blooms.
episodes.title: Noche De Las Chicas

episodes.synopsis: Teresa's team suffers a hard blow. Judge Lafayette pushes for a truce, but Marcel stays dead set on vengeance. Javier's risky romance is revealed.
episodes.title: La Mujer En el Espejo

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Teresa's romantic road trip to Nashville takes an ugly turn, while a boys bonding getaway for Pote and Tony also hits bumps.
episodes.title: Amores Perros

episodes.synopsis: An informant in Gordo's operation is exposed, prompting Team Teresa to hatch an elaborate plan. Tony learns a hard truth about his father.
episodes.title: Secretos Y Mentiras

episodes.synopsis: Running out of time to stop the snitch, Teresa and Pote take drastic measures. Emilia faces a tough choice when she's interrogated by Lafayette.
episodes.title: Los Pecados De Los Padres

episodes.synopsis: Bills come due when Kelly Anne sniffs out a banker's betrayal. With Pote and Teresa's support, Tony takes steps to a new life. Tragedy strikes.
episodes.title: Lo Que Mas Temes

episodes.synopsis: An explosive twist has far-reaching fallout, and Pote scrambles to pick up the pieces. Javier and Boaz have a bloody confrontation over Emilia.
episodes.title: Mientras Dormias

episodes.synopsis: Out for revenge, Teresa meets her match as she dodges deceptions and death threats to find a killer â â and make him pay.
episodes.title: Diosa De la Guerra

episodes.synopsis: Karma, confessions and revenge have fatal consequences for both sides of a brutal battle in New Orleans.
episodes.title: Vienen Por Ti
